backend/main.mo: Defines actor with suit stats, module toggles, life‑support systems, and detailed environmental hazard structures with initial state values.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping features to affected files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries describing purposes and behaviors of various frontend files across the HUD system.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining HUD color variables for light and dark modes along with global background and text styling.
frontend/index.html: Entry HTML file providing root element and loading main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app handling boot sequence, display modes, tab navigation including new Hazard tab, and mounting hazard simulation.
frontend/src/audio/audioBus.ts: Provides central audio bus for SFX and voice playback with safe initialization and autoplay‑restriction handling.
frontend/src/audio/hevVoice.ts: Defines HEV voice playback helpers for module actions, alerts, and state changes using audioBus.
frontend/src/audio/uiSfx.ts: Provides UI sound‑effect helpers for tab switches, toggles, console input, and settings changes.
frontend/src/components/audio/AmbiencePl: Interactive ambience audio player with playlist control, volume, looping, and custom track upload.
frontend/src/components/boot/BootSequenc: Animated boot sequence overlay that types system lines, plays audio cues, and fades out before signaling completion.
frontend/src/components/hazards/Environm: Displays environmental hazard levels with icons, status text, and severity-based styling.
frontend/src/components/hud/HudGlobalEff: Renders global HUD visual effects such as bloom, critical flashing, and presence glow with reduced‑motion handling.
frontend/src/components/hud/HudLayout.ts: Main HUD container applying color schemes, scaling, layout modes, CRT effects, and global overlays around app content.
frontend/src/components/hud/HudOfflineOv: Simple overlay indicating the HUD system is offline with a warning message.
frontend/src/components/hud/MinimalHudVi: Compact HUD view showing key vitals and a control to restore the full standard HUD.
frontend/src/components/hud/Panels.tsx: Reusable HUD panel components including stat meters, vitals panel, and generic panel wrappers.
frontend/src/components/hud/TacticalHudS: Tactical HUD layout with combat modules, sidebars, reticle, and stat displays surrounding custom content.
frontend/src/components/hud/TacticalOver: Renders a tactical HUD overlay with corner frames, center reticle, and multiple system readouts.
frontend/src/components/info/CommandCons: Implements an interactive command console with input handling, history navigation, and command execution.
frontend/src/components/info/ConfirmActi: Provides a confirmation modal using alert-dialog components with configurable text and callbacks.
frontend/src/components/info/SuitSubsyst: Displays suit subsystem statuses and allows toggling systems with confirmation prompts and log entries.
frontend/src/components/info/SystemLogVi: Shows system log entries in a scrollable list with timestamps and type formatting.
frontend/src/components/medical/MedicalD: Displays a medical diagram with colored overlays indicating health and armor status.
frontend/src/components/medical/MedicalR: Generates detailed medical statistics panels based on suit and hazard state values.
frontend/src/components/tactical/RadarPa: Renders an animated radar sweep on canvas with deterministic contacts and status info.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useHazardSimulation.t: Simulates periodic hazard level changes with randomized fluctuations and decay, updating the hazard store on an interval.
frontend/src/hooks/useHudPresence.ts: Tracks pointer/touch movement and updates CSS variables via rAF for reactive HUD effects.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity auth, including login, state restoration, and identity lifecycle handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating stats, module states, hazard statuses, and other actor info.
frontend/src/hooks/useReducedMotion.ts: Detects the user's reduced motion preference via matchMedia and returns a boolean flag.
frontend/src/hooks/useViewportOrientatio: Determines whether the device is in landscape mode using matchMedia and resize/orientation listeners.
frontend/src/index.css: Global styles and Tailwind layers defining color variables, typography, HUD layout, and UI styling.
frontend/src/lib/commands.ts: Parses slash-commands to modify suit stats, hazards, modules, settings, and logs actions.
frontend/src/lib/glyphs.ts: Defines monochrome Unicode glyphs for hazard and status icons.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query client and identity provider.
frontend/src/state/audioState.ts: Manages audio playback, playlist, volume, and custom tracks using Zustand.
frontend/src/state/hazardAlerts.ts: Tracks hazard levels to trigger critical flashing and plays voice alerts.
frontend/src/state/hazardsState.ts: Stores hazard levels with short history and provides trend and severity helpers.
frontend/src/state/infoSettingsState.ts: Holds HUD, voice, and display settings with update actions.
frontend/src/state/suitState.ts: Maintains suit stats and module toggles with setters and reset.
frontend/src/state/systemLog.ts: Manages a list of timestamped log entries and provides add/clear actions.
frontend/src/state/uiState.ts: Tracks UI landscape mode and provides a toggle.
frontend/src/state/weaponSystemsState.ts: Stores selected weapon, ammo type, and fire rate with setters.
frontend/src/tabs/BasicsTab.tsx: Renders core suit stats, hazards panel, and vitals display.
frontend/src/tabs/HazardTab.tsx: Displays detailed hazard levels, trends, backend statuses, and aggregate severity.
frontend/src/tabs/InfoTab.tsx: Renders the Info tab layout with subsystem readouts, system log, and command console panels.
frontend/src/tabs/MedicalTab.tsx: Displays medical readouts inside a simple tab container.
frontend/src/tabs/SettingsTab.tsx: Provides UI controls for display, HUD, voice, tactical mode, landscape mode, and system reset with logging and audio feedback.
frontend/src/tabs/TacticalTab.tsx: Shows tactical radar, readouts, and contact lists within multiple HUD panels.
frontend/src/tabs/UtilitiesTab.tsx: Manages toggles for suit modules and includes an ambience player panel.
frontend/src/tabs/WeaponsTab.tsx: Handles weapon loadout selection, ammo type and fire rate controls, and displays weapon details.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, colors, and plugins for the project.
project_state.json: Defines project metadata and feature requirements for implementing a dedicated Hazard tab with live-updating hazard data.
